Changelog
=========

0.2 (04.02.2019)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 * Remove superfluous "Edit This Page" button (Neal Todd)
 * Fix: Add form media to templates for Wagtail >= 2.3 compatibility (Neal Todd)
 * Fix: Handle unspecified ParentalKey related_names (Andy Chosak)
 * Centralise Wagtail 1 / 2 imports into a compat module (Sultan Iman)
 * Fix: Decode utf-8-sig files (Rodolfo Lottin Pereira)
 * Additional support for Wagtail < 2.0 (Rodolfo Lottin Pereira)


0.1 (02.05.2018)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

 * Original release
